body.name: ThermoFlask Double Wall Vacuum Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle with Two Lids, 24 Ounce, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 4 hrs 20 mins
FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 4 hrs 20 mins
features: Vacuum Insulation: The ThermoFlask keeps beverages ice-cold for 24 hrs, and hot for up to 12 hrs with double-wall and vacuum insulation. This BPA Free stainless steel water bottle won't transfer flavors, won't sweat and does not rust.

Chug and Straw Lid: This water bottle comes with 2 lids; an innovative leak-proof Chug lid and a newly improved straw lid that has been enhanced for better flow. Both allow easy one-handed or hands free sipping

Daily Adventure: Adventure awaits with ThermoFlask insulated stainless steel water bottles. They help you stay refreshed and hydrated for an active lifestyle. Soups and other hot liquids stay heated for hours; cold beverages keep cool throughout the day.

Premium Hydration: Our line of insulated hydration solutions come in 14 to 64 Ounce sizes with a variety of colors. Our insulated water bottles are a convenient size that fits in most cup holders, backpack pockets and in your hand when adventure calls.

ThermoFlask Quality: Whether you want a reusable water bottle for camping and hiking, an insulated commuter cup, or just want to hydrate sustainably, ThermoFlask has a stainless steel water bottle for you
body.description: Keep your beverages cold all day without a cooler (or hot without a microwave!) Our double-wall vacuum insulated stainless steel bottles prevent outside temperatures from affecting the inside beverage temperature so your drink stays just the way you like it; all day long. Great for everyday adventures or outdoor activities like hiking, camping, biking, sports, picnics, and more. Drink the way you want with easy, controlled one-handed drinking. Chug or straw? Your choice. You get both! Note: For maximum flow, please ensure the straw lid is fully extended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best water bottles I've ever owned.
reviews.reviewText: I first bought the 64 oz. bottle a year ago, because I drink a lot of water at night and wanted a big bottle that would stay cold all night long and hold a significant amount of water. This bottle went above and beyond my expectations. I noticed the first time I put ice in it that when I went to fill it the following night, the ice still hadn't melted, after 24 hours. Amazing. That to me is the best thing about these, how long they can actually keep a drink cold, but it isn't the only great feature. The bottles are elegant and well designed. They're heavy duty and feel super sturdy. I dropped my 64 oz down the stairs trying to carry it with a laundry basket and it didn't dent or even really scratch. The bottles are super easy to clean, each piece of the lid comes off so you don't have to worry about scum forming around the straw. I loved it so much that a few months later I bought two more, the purple and black 32 oz bottles. My wife and I wanted to start making our own iced lattes during the summer, since they're like 8 dollars each now, and needed a good bottle with a straw that would keep our drinks cold throughout the day. I instantly thought to look up if they sold 32 oz bottles (size of a large Dunkin iced latte) and sure enough they did so I got them. They've been awesome! I work outside a lot and even In the summer my drink stays ice cold and the ice won't melt until long after I've finished it. Took advantage of the prime day sale and ordered another two (40 oz white and purple). They are extremely well priced compared to their competitors. It's just really refreshing to find a company that makes quality built to last products at a decent price. Can't recommend these enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very useful for hot places
reviews.reviewText: It's much better than I thought. The double-wall insulation does a great job. It keeps my drinks at the right temperature for a long time. The stainless steel build not only makes it look clean and strong but also guarantees that you can use it every day without breaking. Adding two lids, one for drinking and the other for a bigger opening makes it very useful. The Capri color is bright and nice, making it a fashionable extra thing. I like the careful planning because the bottle is simple to get clean and locks well. This stops any leaks from happening. In general, the ThermoFlask is now my favorite water bottle because it works well, lasts long, and looks nice 🙃. I suggest it to anyone looking for a good and useful way to stay hydrated.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality … doesn’t sweat.
reviews.reviewText: This water bottle is of good quality. Wide mouth makes it easy to fill with ice from the refrigerator ice dispenser and it never sweats!! Great choice for bringing back and forth to school too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This think is indestructible!!
reviews.reviewText: I take this thing to work every time I go and man, it has survived a lot. It also keeps ice frozen for 3 days!!!! Way better than a hydro flask too. It’s pretty cheap but definitely built heavy duty. I’ve only dented it once when I accidentally dropped it from high up but it’s such a small dent it’s almost invisible. Definitely recommend! Comes with 2 extra straws, another lid for hot drinks, and the lid for straws! I will definitely buy another one after my first one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Outstanding bottle, keeps the water cold all day, but the only real downside is it doesn't fit into a cupholder. Can't have it all, I guess.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The Thermoflask Double Wall Vacuum Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle With Two Lids is a revolutionary product that combines functionality and style. With its double-wall insulation, it keeps beverages hot or cold for hours, making it perfect for any outdoor activity. The two lids provide versatility, allowing users to choose between a straw lid or a flip lid. This water bottle is not only durable but also eco-friendly, as it eliminates the need for single-use plastic bottles. Stay hydrated in style with the Thermoflask Double Wall Vacuum Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle With Two Lids.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps my water cold all day
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to take on a work trip. I could fill it with ice from the hotel in the morning. Refill from the water cooler in the office and still have some ice in it at bedtime. Have used it every day for 6 months. No issues

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good size, retains coldness allday.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. It's a great size for my 10yr old. Not too big. Yes we've put some dings in this but that's when they're full, heavy & get dropped. Really like the non straw lid the best. Does not come with stickers, however, has great surface for stickers (just won't stay if they keep getting moved around, no fault of flask surface). Looks good with a lot or little or no stickers. Doesn't leak when closed properly & I put it all in dishwasher. Doesn't sweat with ice water. quality.
Great size, great quality, and I absolutely love that it comes with two lids, two straws and keeps my water nice and cold!

Achei mais que suficiente para o que eu pretendia usar, que era só facilitar o processo de beber ~2,6 litros de água por dia, que é o que eu preciso, sem fazer a parte chata de ir ao bebedouro para encher muitas vezes.Alguns prós:- A garrafa parece bem mais bonita pessoalmente- Não precisa gastar mais em garrafas mais caras se o uso for mais simples. Não testei tanto o isolamento térmico, então não posso falar sobre ele, só que me atende bem para a minha necessidade.Contras:- Eu não sei se é normal, se é alguma dificuldade do canudo ou se é eu que não sugo direito, mas às vezes sinto dificuldade em fazer a água subir por ele, fica como se não tivesse água na garrafa e fico sugando ar.- Às vezes sugando pelo canudo a água vem com velocidade, aí se tirar a boca enquanto suga, a água pode "pular" do canudo e molhar a tampa da garrafa. Não molha muito, mas incomoda e eu acho que a solução pra isso é mais ter cuidado mesmo.

Compré este termo/botella con muy altas expectativas y no me equivoqué. Realmente ya llevo muchos meses usándola y no tengo absolutamente ninguna queja, me encanta. La he llevado de viaje conmigo y realmente la mantengo a mi lado todo el tiempo, incluso empecé a personalizarla con stickers y no se han caído aún lavándola. La textura de la botella me encanta y no es de un tamaño excesivo (compré la de 24 Oz o 700 ml para tener un tamaño medio y me lleve una grata experiencia). Personalmente me encanta porque no es particularmente pesada y cabe en el portavasos de mi auto.Definitivamente mantiene las bebidas frías durante casi todo el día, me atrevería a decir que al menos unas 8 horas si no es que hasta 12 o más. Le he puesto hielo por la mañana ante de salir de casa y la he rellenado con agua ambiente durante el día para siempre tener agua fría conmigo y me ha funcionado incluso de viaje en entornos mucho más calientes y dejando la botella en el auto. No soy mucho de bebidas calientes, así que no podría decir mucho al respecto. Sin embargo, he llevado varias cosas y nunca queda un sabor diferente ni desagradable. Siempre se siente limpio (claro que lavo con regularidad todas las partes de la botella. No “transpira” y nunca ha goteado para mi. Incluso se me ha caído en un par de ocasiones y si bien sí quedan marcas si se le observa con detenimiento, no tiene abolladuras realmente notables y la pintura no se ve maltratada aún después de unos cuantos golpes, así que la considero de súper alta calidad. Debería durar cuánto la cuides!La única cuestión que es más consejo de queja: Al momento de lavar la tapa tipo popote, tengan cuidado, yo me quise pasar de limpieza y retire la boquilla, pero el sello no volvió a funcionar, por lo que esa tapa quedó prácticamente inservible, así que evítenlo :(. Al haber sido esto mi culpa, mantengo la calificación de 5 estrellas considerando que siento puedes comprarlo a un excelente precio!
